justification: The Methods section notes: "In all cohorts, we assessed child gastrointestinal (GI) symptomatology using parent reports from the CBCL…"

measured_by: Screen for Child Anxiety Related Disorders – Parent version (SCARED-P)
justification: The article states: "Parent report: We measured anxiety-related behaviors in all cohorts using the Screen for Child Anxiety Related Disorders-Parent version (SCARED-P)."

measured_by: Screen for Child Anxiety Related Disorders – Child version (SCARED-C)
justification: Under Child report: "Youth reported on their own anxiety-related behaviors using a child version of the SCARED scale (SCARED-C)."

measured_by: Kiddie Schedule for Affective Disorders and Schizophrenia – Children’s Version (KSADS) clinician consensus
justification: The Methods explain: "In the HBN cohort, youth completed… the KSADS, and… a clinical team reviewed these materials… to arrive at a consensus for diagnoses of DSM-5 disorders."
